custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Drawer is opened
AND the Settings is opened
AND "Login" button clicked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show the native login page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the username is populated
AND the password is populated

WHEN the login button is pressed
AND the username and password are correct
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is logged in 
AND redirected to the Settings page

title: User Registration
custom_preconds:
QA Notes:

Ignore the confirm password field in the designs, we just need username, password and DOB.

Dev Notes: 

Expectation is the user will be logged in after successful registration.

Include field validation from Rally: https://github.mlbam.net/causal-gaming/rally-android/blob/86a86fec511d97e8e1daa49bdd60ea43d1d8c979/app/src/main/res/layout/sign_up_fragment.xml

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN non logged in user
AND the Settings is visible
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display an option to "Create MLB Account"

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN non logged in user
AND the Settings is visible
WHEN "Create MLB Account" is tapped

GIVEN a user on the registration page
WHEN all fields have been entered

GIVEN a user on the registration page
WHEN a user registration fails
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display the okta error to the user

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user on the registration page
WHEN the Sing Up button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN register the user with okta

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user on the registration page
WHEN a user is successfully registered

GIVEN a user on the success screen
WHEN the user taps the continue button OR clicks the back
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user reenters the app logged in

title: Login - invalid credentials
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the login view
custom_steps:
WHEN I enter my credentials
AND tap login
AND my credentials are invalid
custom_expected: THEN I should be shown an error message
